类的使用
Task

  • 未命名程序包中Task的使用

    返回Task的未命名程序包中的方法
    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    Task[]
    TaskQueue.getAllTasks()
    Retrieves all tasks in the queue as an array.
    Task
    TaskScheduler.getNextPendingTask()
    Retrieves the next pending task from the task queue.
    Task
    TaskDAO.getTaskById(String taskId)
    Retrieves a task from the database by its ID.
    Task
    TaskQueue.peek()
    Retrieves, but does not remove, the highest-priority task.
    Task
    TaskQueue.poll()
    Retrieves and removes the highest-priority task.
    返回变量类型为Task的类型的未命名程序包中的方法
    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    List<Task>
    TaskDAO.getAllTasks()
    Retrieves all tasks from the database.
    参数类型为Task的未命名程序包中的方法
    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    void
    TaskQueue.addTask(Task task)
    Adds a new task to the queue.
    void
    TaskScheduler.cancelReminder(Task task)
    Cancels the reminder for the given task.
    void
    TaskScheduler.completeTask(Task task)
    Marks the given task as completed, cancels its reminder, and removes it from the queue.
    void
    TaskScheduler.TaskReminderHandler.onTaskReminder(Task task)
     
    boolean
    TaskQueue.removeTask(Task task)
    Removes a specific task from the queue.
    void
    TaskScheduler.rescheduleTask(Task task, LocalDateTime newReminderTime)
    Reschedules a reminder for the given task with a new reminder time.
    void
    TaskDAO.saveTask(Task task)
    Saves a new task to the database.
    void
    TaskScheduler.scheduleTask(Task task)
    Schedules a new task and sets up its reminder.
    void
    TaskDAO.updateTask(Task task)
    Updates an existing task in the database.
    void
    TaskQueue.updateTaskPriority(Task task, Task.TaskPriority newPriority)
    Updates the priority of a specific task.
